registration.success: Welcome to Veganaut.net {{ name }}! You are now logged in. We're sending you an e-mail with a link so you can set your password for later logins.

locationTask.error: Sorry, there was a problem when trying to save:

update.error: Sorry, your profile couldn't be updated.

resetPassword.invalidToken: Your password reset token has expired. Please request a new token.
resetPassword.success: Password reset successful. You can now log in.

register.title: Participate
register.description: To add, rate or edit anything on Veganaut.net, please register.
register.alreadyRegistered: Already have an account? Log in here.

login.title: Login
login.registerInstead: I don't have an account yet.

forgot.title: We'll send you an e-mail so you can set a new password.

new.type: What type of location would you like to add?

name.gastronomy: What is the name of the restaurant / take-away / canteen that you would like to add?
name.retail: What is the name of the shop / supermarket that you would like to add?

new.selectCoordinates: Where is the location? Mark the exact spot by hand and/or with the search function.

AddProduct.title: What (additional) vegan products are available here?

BuyProduct.title: Buy something vegan here!
BuyProduct.description: Money is probably the only argument for veganism that everyone understands. So, argue for veganism by spending your money on something vegan here!

completedTasks.none: You're the first veganaut to use the money argument here. Thanks! This will motivate ohters to do the same.
completedTasks.some: The money argument has now been used {{ count }} times here. Thanks for the +1! This is additional motivation for ohters to do the same.

GiveFeedback.title: Give the staff feedback!
GiveFeedback.description: Talk to the staff (or write them), giving praise, feedback or suggestions for improvement.

notesTitle.yes: Inspire others by sharing what you are telling them and/or what they reply!
notesTitle.maybe: Inspire others by sharing what you might tell them

completedTasks.thisLocation: To inspire you, here's what someone else wrote here: "{{ text }}" ({{ person }}, {{ year }})
completedTasks.otherLocation: To inspire you, here's what someone else wrote here at another location: "{{ text }}" ({{ person }} at {{ location }}, {{ city }}, {{ year }})
completedTasks.fallback: Here's an example of what someone might write here: "I told the staff that I came here because a friend said they have great vegan deserts. I love vegan deserts!"

HowWellDoYouKnowThisLocation.title: How well do you know this location?

knowLocation.fewTimes: I've come here a few times

MentionVegan.title: Use the word "vegan" when talking to the staff here!
MentionVegan.description: Buying vegan offers is good, but it is even better if the staff knows that these offers were bought because they are vegan. Equally good: If the staff learns that non-vegan offers would be bought if they were vegan. And since no one can read your mind: Tell them, use the word "vegan"!

notesTitle.yes: Inspire others by sharing what you are saying to them and/or what they reply!
notesTitle.maybe: Inspire others by sharing what you might say to them

completedTasks.thisLocation: To inspire you, here's what someone else wrote: "{{ text }}" ({{ person }}, {{ year }})
completedTasks.otherLocation: To inspire you, here's what someone else wrote at another location: "{{ text }}" ({{ person }} at {{ location }}, {{ city }}, {{ year }})
completedTasks.fallback: Here's an example of what someone might write: "I told the staff that I came here because a friend said they have great vegan deserts. I love vegan deserts!"

SetLocationCoordinates.title: Change coordinates
SetLocationCoordinates.description: Click in the map below to select the new location.

SetLocationDescription.title: Description
SetLocationDescription.placeholder: Short description of this location, e.g. opening hours or ambience.

SetLocationExistence.title: Location status
SetLocationExistence.description: Does this location even exist? Is the business still running or has it been discontinued? Or has this location been entered twice and this entry is the less informative one and can be deleted?

SetLocationProductListComplete.title: Is the list of vegan offers complete?

completeness.incompleteGoodSummary: No, but it's a good summary of the offer here
completeness.incomplete: No, and it's not a good summary either

RateLocationQuality.title: Rate the vegan choice at this location!
RateLocationQuality.description: The more twigs the bigger and better the vegan choice.

rating.1: As of yet, there is more or less no vegan choice here.
rating.2: So far, there is only a small vegan choice here.
rating.3: The vegan choice here is OK.
rating.4: The vegan choice here is good.
rating.5: The vegan choice here is excellent.

RateProduct.title: How do you rate this offer?

TagLocation.title: Which vegan offers of this location do you like?

rating.1: Location with almost no vegan choice
rating.2: Location with only a small vegan choice
rating.3: Location with an OK vegan choice
rating.4: Location with a good vegan choice
rating.5: Location with an excellent vegan choice

listCompleteness: List complete? - In the edit-mode you can indicate it!
listCompleteness.incompleteGoodSummary: List complete? - No, but a good summary.

quality.explanation: The more twigs the bigger and better the vegan offer here.
quality.noRatingExplanation: The quality of the vegan offer has not been evaluated yet. Be the first to rate it!

tags.explanation: The tags show what people like here.

existence.existing: This location is still in business
existence.wronglyEntered: This location entry was made by mistake

marker.title: Zoom in to show these {{numLocations}} locations.

globalFilters.title: Sort by
globalFilters.howSorted: How should the results be sorted?

rating.noRating: This product hasn't been rated yet.

availability.unknown: Is this offer always available? - Tell us if you know!
availability.sometimes: This offer is not always available.
availability.not: This offer is no longer available.

open.text1: All our infos about vegan offers were contributed by people like you and can be used freely for your own projects: Veganaut is

participate.text: Do you want to help others to explore the vegan universe? Veganaut lets you share and rate vegan discoveries.

missingFeature.showMoreSearchResults: Sorry, showing more results doesn't work yet. We're still programming this feature. Thanks for letting us know your interest!

subtitle.world: Vegan offer in the whole world
subtitle.withId: Vegan offer in a radius of {{radius}} around {{area}}:
subtitle.withoutId: Vegan offer in a radius of {{radius}} around {{area}}:

rating.0: {{numLocations}} locations which have not yet been rated by any Veganauts. You could be the first to rate them!
rating.1: {{numLocations}} locations with more or less no vegan choice (according to the latest evaluations by Veganauts).
rating.2: {{numLocations}} locations with only a small vegan choice (according to the latest evaluations by Veganauts).
rating.3: {{numLocations}} locations with an OK vegan choice (according to the latest evaluations by Veganauts).
rating.4: {{numLocations}} locations with a good vegan choice (according to the latest evaluations by Veganauts).
rating.5: {{numLocations}} locations with an excellent vegan choice (according to the latest evaluations by Veganauts).

embedded.spaceChickMessage: On veganaut.net you can browse all the vegan offers as a list, add new locations and much more. Check it out!
